title: Bans
body: So i was trying to play a game of Nemesis Draft, i had my first load lag kind of thing so my connection isn't so great, but my connection didn't get me in the game or whatever fast enough and i got "banned" for "AFK". Which i think is bs, riot can you edit your coding stuff or whatever with bans. ABSOLUTE BS.

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like you were gone for long enough to enable the /remake system.  It's important to try and resolve whatever is causing you to have a network issue, otherwise you can incur more penalties like [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  For your specific issue, I suggest going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and get in game.  Hope that helps!
